subject: Economy
question_en: What is the difference between Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and Gross National Product (GNP)?
question_hi: ग्रॉस डोमेंट प्रीमोर्न (GDP) और ग्रॉस विश्वविभागी (GNP) को बतायें।
A_en: GDP represents the total value of goods and services produced within a country, while GNP represents the total value of goods and services produced by a country's citizens, regardless of their location.
A_hi: GDP ब्लॉग और सेवाएं की कोणतीत चरणारी किया जाता है, जो कि सर्वशेष करणारी करते हैं, जो सर्वशेष करणारी करते हैं, जो सर्वशेष करणारी करते हैं,
question_hi: राजधानी करने के लोग बीमानियों का क्षेता करते हैं, जो सर्वशेष करते हैं।
explanation_en: The correct answer is Jodhpur, which is known as the City of Palaces and is located in the state of Rajasthan.
